project_descr: Programme will  focus on  i)  public sector policies & legal/regulatory frameworks for effective public sector management;  ii) institutional transparency, accountability iii) Non-state Actor engagement  to demand for accountability &transparency.

outputs.output_descr: The Institutional Effectiveness Programme  will address three inter-related bottlenecks hindering institutional effectiveness, transparency and accountability in Uganda’s public sector, well analysed in UNDAF 2016-2020.
Institutional Transformation for Gender Equality and Women Empowerment Project Initiation Plan
